website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, comfortable, and well-made, this contemporary Moses basket has a lot to offer for parents and baby.
pros: A modern take on the Moses basket with a cute dinosaur design and breathable fabric
Not too heavy, but provides reliable support for baby with comfortable foam padding
Has a removable sunshade for outdoor use
Eeasy to fold for travel or storage
cons: The downside of the whimsical theme is that it may not appeal to a parent who prefers traditional styling

customer_reviews.title: Compact when folded and solid when unfolded
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new born who takes naps throughout the day. I wanted a portable bassinet and found this product. What I like is the slim profile when it is folded up. To unfold takes less than a minute. Once it is setup, it supports the weight of a baby and provides good protection around the edges. The inner cushion is also soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking baby outside
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because it was the only Moses basket we could find that would accommodate our enormous child, he is already 20 pounds at 6 months! We mostly use it for taking him outside for some morning sun to help set his circadian rhythm - it's really nice to have something you can carry him in and set him down in, and he doesn't mind hanging out in it for a little while. It's handy, feels sturdy, and looks cute!
customer_reviews.author: Berylind

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my baby could have somwhere to sleep comfortably without being in someone's arms while we are out. It's very sturdy but incredibly soft inside. Carrying him around in it, I don't feel like he will fall through or fall out. Overall a great quality product. We've received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara King

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, portable and light weight but durable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a portable bed for my new born child and come across this cute dinosaurs design portable bed. It arrives as described. It is very durable, the pad is soft for baby and yet still has the support baby needs. The handles and zipper are well made. Soft fabric lining inside, baby sleeps really comfortable in there. Take out from the box, put the bed pad inside and ready to use. 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Ha

customer_reviews.title: Great baby bed
customer_reviews.text: This baby carrier/bed is even better than I hoped it would be. My baby is small, so I use it inside her bassifnt at night, and then I move it around the house with me during the day. It is sturdy, and baby seems to be very comfortable in it. The design is super cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: Margot Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry bassinet for my little one!
customer_reviews.text: This item was bought as a gift. The comments were provided by the recipient. “This bassinet is lightweight, well-made and very convenient to carry a sleeping baby and to keep my little one “cosy”. It is large enough to hold a change of pampers and a bottle. I love it!”
customer_reviews.author: AT Romero

customer_reviews.title: Please send mattress pad!
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with mattress pad e mailed sunveno 3 days ago have not heard back from them! Very frustrated! No way to rate this without mattress pad! Will ship back if I don’t hear from someone soon!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Golden

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my new grandson, due to arrive on March 6, 2020. I seems really well made and is just adorable. Can't wait to see the little guy snuggled down in it!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy O.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: This baby bassinet carrier is everything the views said it was and even better. Don't hesitate to buy this or give as a gift. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TC in CT

customer_reviews.title: Great baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: So far, we like the carrier. It did not have any smells out of the box. The inside shell is very soft and the padding is very thick. Seems to be well built. No complaints. I am happy to gift something so special to a special baby!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cute sturdy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great! I purchased it because my baby didn't like sleeping in his crib. He sleeps super well in this and I enjoy that I can take him around the house as he's sleeping with out waking him. It's really cute and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: a very comfortable & portable bed for infants
customer_reviews.text: Glad to receive it on the day just before the Chinese new year so that we can use it for a short trip during the holiday. i am very pleased with this product as it is very easy to fold & carry around, and it keeps the little one comfortable (she has never protested) and warm regardless of the external situations. i recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: chdmok

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it. Very soft sides. He puts his nose into the side :) Easy to carry with him in it.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good. My nephew likes it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My little nephew loves it. He likes to sleep in this bed. It doesnt make him sweat like the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy and cozy!!
customer_reviews.text: This carrycot is not only super cute, but extremely comfortable and warm. It is good quality and looks just like the pictures. I'm sure my - soon to be born - son will love it! I wish they had adult versions of it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan W.

customer_reviews.title: We loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material. We loved it too bad our 5 month child won’t fit in it anymore. I wish they have different sizes. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Yared

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Baby love it so did parents. Super convenient, lightweight. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cez

customer_reviews.title: Convienient
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to pack it around the house and taking it with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea von Borstel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality material, very cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this little carry bassinet, it's so adorable. Made extremely well and nice firm mattress inside l, easy to carry sleeping baby from 1 room to the other. It came with a seat belt strap but no instructions. I'm guessing you can strap the bassinet into the backseat of your car, but I wouldnt. Might use the seatbelt extender for something else for transport. Overall absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between this and a more traditional Moses basket for my 3rd child. My 2nd child was only 17 months old so I wanted something fairly rigid in order to keep his little not-so-gentle hands at a safe distance from new little one. This carrier was absolutely adorable, SUPER soft inside and had a decently rigid form while still folding down somewhat flat. The shade was nice (and less face it, downright adorable) but not being able to lower it was the only thing that was somewhat of a "con". I think it would do the job to have somewhere to sit baby on the couch, floor etc when they are small and would be more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri223

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing I’ve Bought my Baby so Far!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I’ve bought for my bundle. So, so soft! My bundle likes to cuddle by pressing her cheek against the side. It has a nice cover over her head too so if there is a draft, she’s protected. It’s big/small enough to make a baby comfortable and it serves as a makeshift changing table. It’s easy to clean, it’s foldable and the design is cute as well!
customer_reviews.author: PsychoBunny

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I brought this before I had my baby because car seat is to heavy .this bed is lightweight and very soft I love it
customer_reviews.author: Loby Barbeau

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this. So does Mom and Dad, it’s very soft and sturdy. Can bring it from room to room, Much better choice for a Moses basket. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R. Champoux

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cozy carrier for our tot
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to toss our newborn in as we go up and down stairs, etc..we actually used it a lot to put the baby in and set outside while I did yard work in the early fall. It was perfect and baby found it cozy! I'll even spin my baby around in it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Chachatat

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe sleep solution
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a safe co-sleeper, traveling bassinet with breathable materials. The bumpers are not breathable and pose a serious threat to an infant if they were to roll into them. The “safety belt” does not deter rolling. I bought this to have an easy-to-travel with bassinet and it was a waste of money because I cannot leave my baby alone in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kellin Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move baby
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for moving baby from room to room. Baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby items I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: First time mom here. My baby loves this lounger! It’s very sturdy and super cute. Even his pediatrician commented she was impressed with it. Great alternative to lugging around a car seat carrier, which is exactly what I was going for. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Dincher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I bought it for my nephew as a present after he was born. We are very satisfied with the feel. Wish it was a bit affordable tho. But since it’s the only one of its kind it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: How well it is made and does not lose its shape
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and practical
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, very convenient. Exactly like the description. Received package really fast. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kes

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her gift
customer_reviews.text: It did take two different orders and a return, but the seller did get it right. My daughter loves her gift, even if it is a little late and took more effort than I would have liked. The Moses Basket is great, it is made well and easy to use and pack up. I'm glad I went through the necessary effort for this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne C. Cook

product_meta.title: SUNVENO Baby Bed & Baby Lounger, Moses Basket Bassinet Bedside Sleeper Newborn Infant Travel Bed Carrycot for 0-12 Months (Gray)
feature_bullets: MATERIAL: Organic Cotton Hypoallergenic Polyester Fiber Fill, 28.8" L x 14.2" W x 13.4" H

SAFE, PORTABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Safe, comfortable transportation with soft recline for your infant from 0-12 months of age; comfortable yet sturdy base supports weight of baby; contoured, cushioned sides keep baby secure and content

EASY TO USE: Adorable, eye-catching dinosaur carrycot secure yet lightweight; easy to quickly fold and unfold; slim profile when folded for easy storage in car or on plane; comfortable mattress pad removable for washing; convenient alternative to carrying around heavy car seat

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Can be used as carrier, crib, playpen, feeding area, changing station, or safe, comfortable bassinet bed for newborn; gives baby a familiar place to sleep and play, wherever you go!

MADE FROM SOFT, BREATHABLE MATERIALS: Ultra-plush, machine-washable fabric; soft, breathable, non-toxic mattress with hypoallergenic bumpers and ultra-soft cover safe for sensitive baby skin; sturdy support board at the bottom of basket; handle is designed to be stable and will not deform

90-DAY WARRANTY: Though we know you’ll love your new product, we do offer a full 90-day money-back guarantee for all SUNVENO products. If you have any questions, please contact us and our service team will respond within 24 hours
